text: Kalzeubet Pahimi Deubet is a Chadian businessman, economist, and politician.Madjiasra Nako, "Chad's president appoints economist as PM after government quits" , Reuters, 21 November 2013. He became Prime Minister of Chad in November 2013 after the resignation of Djimrangar Dadnadji. ==Related pages== * List of scientists from Africa ==References== Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Chad Category:Economists Category:African businesspeople Category:1957 births
title: Kalzeubet Pahimi Deubet
